title: Definable Moments
description: The classic 'Bad Boy meets Good Girl' love story, with a bit of gang violence and mayhem thrown in for good measure.19 year old Isaac Molina is running from his past and has run to a place that is as foreign to him as truth is to a politician. His journey takes him from the violent drug war streets of East LA to the buggy filled streets of Lancaster Pennsylvania, where he meets 'Clarice' - the dream girl he didn't know could ever exist. The Cuban American teen soon finds himself running from a violent gang that has dogged his steps for years; this time he has the love of his life to protect.A fateful moment comes when he must decide to continue to run from his past, and betray his new love, or confront his past and face the consequences. The decision will define the man he is to be.
author: D.B. Stephens
